tool_description: Provides specific suggestions to enhance resume content by integrating target keywords while maintaining natural language flow and readability.

current_content.description: Current resume section or content to enhance

target_keywords.description: Keywords to integrate into the content

content_section.description: Type of content: summary, experience, skills, education, or achievements

enhancement_style.description: Enhancement approach: conservative, moderate, or aggressive

preserve_length.description: Whether to maintain similar content length

error_messages: Empty content provided: Include actual resume content to enhance.
No target keywords: Provide at least one keyword for integration.
Invalid content section: Use one of [summary, experience, skills, education, achievements].
Invalid enhancement style: Use one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive].
Too many keywords: Provide no more than 20 keywords for effective integration.
usage: Provide current content, target keywords, and content section type. Optionally specify enhancement style and length preferences.

integration_notes.description: Explanations of how keywords were integrated

alternative_versions.description: Alternative enhanced versions of the content
